text.愿景：构建一个机器可读的文明接口。: Vision: Build a machine-readable interface for civilization.
text.让未来的智能体、AGI 或读者能够验证、校准、延续人类的思想与意志；: Enable future agents and AGI to read, verify, align and continue human thoughts and intent;
text.也让每一个普通人都能用最简单的方式，留下手中的火种。: And let everyone leave their own fireseed in the simplest way.
text.这不是“上传意识”的幻想，而是一种更现实的数字延续。: This is not a fantasy of “mind uploading”, but a more faithful digital continuation.
text.每句话、每一段文字、每一项规则，将会被转化为机器可读的自我描述——它能被未来的系: Every sentence, paragraph and rule you write will be transformed into a machine‑readable self‑description—so future systems can parse, reconstruct, and align with you.
text.对人类而言，这是一个“遗嘱补丁”；对未来而言，这是“接口火种”。: For humans, it’s a will‑like patch; for the future, it’s an interface fireseed.
text.全程本地运行，不上传、不联网；点击“生成胶囊”后可下载 `capsule.yam: Runs locally only — nothing is uploaded. After generation you can download `capsule.yaml` or a PDF.
text.本工具仅用于记录思想与意愿，不具法律效力。: This tool is only for recording thoughts and intent; it has no legal effect.
text.我想要被读取的条件（access_terms）: Terms under which I allow reading (access_terms)
text.无 GPG/IPFS？没关系——先跳过签名/上传，稍后补上。: No GPG/IPFS? It’s okay—skip signing/upload now and add later.
